import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-chore', templateUrl: './create-chore.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-chore.component.css'] }) export class CreateChoreComponent { choresForm: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ id: new FormControl(), title: new FormControl(), category: new FormControl(), time: new FormControl(), }); }
